channel.title: About on Bogdan Radu
channel.description: Recent content in About on Bogdan Radu

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a PostDoc at the Radon instutute for computational and applied mathematics (RICAM) in Linz, Austria. I received my PhD in applied mathematics from TU Darmstadt on “Finite element mass lumping for H(div) and H(curl)" under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Herbert Egger. Research Interest I am an expert in finite element methods with mass lumping. More details to follow ;) Preprints H.Egger, B.Radu : A Yee-like finite element scheme for Maxwell’s equations on hybrid grids, arXiv 2022 Publications In reverse chronological order:
